verses.name: 2 Samuel 20:10
verses.text: But Amasa took no heed to the sword that was in Joab’s hand: so he smote him therewith in the fifth rib, and shed out his bowels to the ground, and struck him not again; and he died. So Joab and Abishai his brother pursued after Sheba the son of Bichri.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 20:11
verses.text: And one of Joab’s men stood by him, and said, He that favoureth Joab, and he that is for David, let him go after Joab.
